meanings.definition: A person or thing that sputters.
meanings.sent1: The old car had many sputterers in its engine.
meanings.sent2: The mechanic fixed the sputterers in the machine.
meanings.sent3: The sputterers in the fireworks display added a unique touch.
meanings.sent4: The sputterers of the faulty microphone disrupted the speech.
meanings.sent5: The sputterers in the campfire made the night feel cozy.

meanings.definition: To make a series of explosive noises.
meanings.sent1: The fireworks sputterers loudly in the sky.
meanings.sent2: The old engine sputterers when starting up.
meanings.sent3: The popcorn sputterers in the microwave were amusing to watch.
meanings.sent4: The rain sputterers on the roof like a drumbeat.
meanings.sent5: The firecrackers sputterers and spark in the dark night.

meanings.definition: To speak in a hasty or confused manner.
meanings.sent1: She sputterers nervously during the presentation.
meanings.sent2: The child sputterers when trying to explain the situation.
meanings.sent3: His sputterers of excuses made everyone laugh.
meanings.sent4: The politician sputterers through the tough questions.
meanings.sent5: The teacher sputterers through the lesson due to a cold.
